Question
========

Of 8 subjects, before and after a given exertion of force, the heart rate is measured. We want to test whether the average heart rate before and after the effort is equal. Of the 8 differences between pre- and post-measurement the mean is 35 and the standard deviation is 28. The value of the test size of the paired T test is then

Answerlist
----------

* 2.77
* 3.4
* 3.54
* 3.55

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* 2.77: Incorrect
* 3.4: Incorrect
* 3.54: Correct
* 3.55: Incorrect
